text.description:
{Ring of the Vampire King}

Reduces Max Health of units in the hero's army by 30%, but grants them a 40% Vampiric Attack and turns all your units Undead.
text.event: You finally found the lair of the Vampire King. Too afraid to fight him head on, you sneak into his vault and steal his ring, before he catches your wind.
text.name: Ring of the Vampire King
